name: Circuloid!
description:
- Arcade experience exclusively designed for Apple Watch
- Use the digital crown to control your paddle
- Record your best times and other stats
- Optional haptic feedback for a more engaging experience

Catch matching particles to grow your ring. Avoid wrong-colored particles--they make your ring shrink.

Complete a full circle to advance to the next stage. But watch out--a new color is added with each new stage, bringing more mayhem and requiring more skill to avoid the wrong particles.
